additional_trust_certs_file.description: PEM formatted file with additional certificates to trust for TLS connection

solidserverversion.description: SOLIDServer Version in case API user does not have admin permissions

class.description: The class associated to the application.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to application.

fqdn.description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the application to create.

gslb_members.description: The names of the GSLB servers applying the application traffic policy.

name.description: The name of the application to create.

address.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6 depending on the node) of the application node to create.

application.description: The name of the application associated to the node.

failback_threshold.description: The healthcheck failback threshold for the application node to create (Supported: 1-10; Default: 3).

failure_threshold.description: The healthcheck failure threshold for the application node to create (Supported: 1-10; Default: 3).

fqdn.description: The fqdn of the application associated to the node.

healthcheck.description: The healthcheck name for the application node to create (Supported: ok,ping,tcp,http; Default: ok).

healthcheck_frequency.description: The healthcheck frequency in second for the application node to create (Supported: 10,30,60,300; Default: 60).

healthcheck_timeout.description: The healthcheck timeout in second for the application node to create (Supported: 1-10; Default: 3).

name.description: The name of the application node to create.

pool.description: The name of the application pool associated to the node.

weight.description: The weight of the application node to create.

affinity.description: Enable session affinity for the application pool.

affinity_session_duration.description: The time each session is maintained in sec (Default: 300).

application.description: The name of the application associated to the pool.

best_active_nodes.description: Number of best active nodes when lb_mode is set to latency.

fqdn.description: The fqdn of the application associated to the pool.

ip_version.description: The IP protocol version used by the application pool to create (Supported: ipv4, ipv6; Default: ipv4).

lb_mode.description: The load balancing mode of the application pool to create (Supported: weighted,round-robin,latency; Default: round-robin).

name.description: The name of the application pool to create.
The name of the custom DB.

custom_db.description: The name of the Custom DB into which creating the data.

class.description: The class associated to the device.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to device.

name.description: The name of the device to create.

class.description: The class associated to the forward zone.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to the forward zone.

dnsserver.description: The managed SMART DNS server name, or DNS server name hosting the forward zone.

dnsview.description: The DNS view name hosting the forward zone.

forward.description: The forwarding mode of the forward zone (Supported: only, first; Default: only).

forwarders.description: The IP address list of the forwarder(s) to use for the forward zone.

name.description: The Domain Name served by the forward zone.

dnsserver.description: The managed SMART DNS server name, or DNS server name hosting the RR's zone.

dnsview.description: The View name of the RR to create.

dnszone.description: The Zone name of the RR to create.

name.description: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the RR to create.

ttl.description: The DNS Time To Live of the RR to create.

type.description: The type of the RR to create (Supported: A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT).

value.description: The value od the RR to create.

address.description: The IPv4 address of the DNS server to create.

allow_query.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS server (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_recursion.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS server for recursion (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_transfer.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS server for zone transfert (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

class.description: The class associated to the DNS server.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to the DNS server.

comment.description: Custom information about the DNS server.

forward.description: The forwarding mode of the DNS server (Supported: none, first, only; Default: none).

forwarders.description: The list of forwarders' IP address to be used by the DNS server.

login.description: The login to use for enrolling of the DNS server.

name.description: The name of the DNS server to create.

password.description: The password to use the enrolling of the DNS server.

recursion.description: The recursion mode of the DNS server (Default: true).

smart.description: The DNS SMART the DNS server must join.

smart_role.description: The role the DNS server will play within the SMART (Supported: master, slave; Default: slave).

type.description: The type of DNS server (Supported: ipm (SOLIDserver or Linux Package); Default: ipm).

allow_query.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS server (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_recursion.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS server for recursion (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_transfer.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the DNS erver for zone transfert (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

arch.description: The DNS SMART architecture (Suported: multimaster, masterslave, single; Default: masterslave).

class.description: The class associated to the DNS SMART.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to the DNS SMART.

comment.description: Custom information about the DNS SMART.

forward.description: The forwarding mode of the DNS SMART (Supported: none, first, only; Default: none).

forwarders.description: The IP address list of the forwarder(s) configured to configure on the DNS SMART.

members.description: The name of the DNS SMART members.

name.description: The name of the DNS SMART to create.

recursion.description: The recursion mode of the DNS SMART (Default: true).

allow_query.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the view (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_recursion.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the view for recursion (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

allow_transfer.description: A list of network prefixes allowed to query the view for zone transfert (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

class.description: The class associated to the DNS view.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to the view.

dnsserver.description: The name of DNS server or DNS SMART hosting the DNS view to create.

forward.description: The forwarding mode of the DNS SMART (Supported: none, first, only; Default: none).

forwarders.description: The IP address list of the forwarder(s) configured to configure on the DNS SMART.

match_clients.description: A list of network prefixes used to match the clients of the view (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

match_to.description: A list of network prefixes used to match the traffic to the view (named ACL(s) are not supported using this provider).  Use '!' to negate an entry.

name.description: The name of the DNS view to create.

order.description: The level of the DNS view, where 0 represents the highest level in the views hierarchy.

recursion.description: The recursion mode of the DNS view (Default: true).

also_notify.description: The list of IP addresses (Format <IP>:<Port>) that will receive zone change notifications in addition to the NS listed in the SOA

class.description: The class associated to the zone.

class_parameters.description: The class parameters associated to the zone.

createptr.description: Automaticaly create PTR records for the zone.

dnsview.description: The name of DNS view hosting the DNS zone to create.

name.description: The Domain Name to be hosted by the zone.

notify.description: The expected notify behavior (Supported: empty (Inherited), Yes, No, Explicit; Default: empty (Inherited).

space.description: The name of a space associated to the zone.

type.description: The type of the zone to create (Supported: Master).
